name: .KIN File Extension
summary: Learn about .KIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Audio project file created by Kinetic, an application for creating electronic music; stores audio loops and instrument patches on a multitrack timeline; can be exported to common audio formats (e.g., .WAV or .MP3) and played in a standard audio player.

content: NOTE: Cakewalk Kinetic is no longer developed and was succeeded by Cakewalk SONAR.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
